title: Bank of England governor says inflation is set to reach target level sooner than expected
summary_full: BoE governor Andrew Bailey told CNBC that the U.K. is set to meet its inflation target ahead of schedule.
summary_public: BoE governor Andrew Bailey told CNBC that the U.K. is set to meet its inflation target ahead of schedule.

GB.label: neutral
GB.evidence: U.K. is set to meet its inflation target ahead of schedule
